stimulusHtml: Which of the following code segments, appearing in a class other than Date, will correctly create an instance of a Date object?

features.html:
Consider the following Date class. 

 

public class Date
{
    private String month;
    private int day;
 
    public Date(String m, int d)
    { /* implementation not shown */ }
   
    // Class contains no other constructors. Other methods are not shown.
 }

choicesHtml:
Date birthday = new Date();
birthday.month = "September";
birthday.day = 5;
